Topic.Title: It directs to a error when I try to create a interactive story via quest online

Posts.EditableText: When I try to create a interactive story via Quest online, it directs to a error. Does anyone know how to it can be fixed?
Posts.HTML: When I try to create a interactive story via Quest online, it directs to a error. Does anyone know how to it can be fixed?

Posts.EditableText:
What's the error?

The most likely solution is to make sure you're using the secure site. The address of the "create game" page should be https://textadventures.co.uk/create/new - if it says "http" instead of "https" it won't work.

You should always use https where possible.
Posts.HTML:
What's the error?

The most likely solution is to make sure you're using the secure site. The address of the "create game" page should be https://textadventures.co.uk/create/new - if it says "http" instead of "https" it won't work.

You should always use https where possible.
